source.d71abcf1:
# Problem Statement ## What is the effect of Alkalinephos , baseexcess , lactate on Sepsis Incidence? ### Dataframes to be used: df - whole ICU data
admitted_with_sepsis_df - data of patients who are admitted to ICU with sepsis
sepsis_after_adm_df - data of patients who get sepsis after admission
septic_df - data of all patients who got sepsis before or after ICU admission
non_septic_df - data of patients are non septic
source.1b9cc2a5: There are 600 rows and 259 columns in Data sheet
